dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.serv.cfs.role.CustomerFacingServiceRole
dataStructure.description:
This class defines a Service in terms of a set of ServiceRoles for a CustomerFacingService. This is the base class for defining ServiceRoles that are used to represent the variable characteristics of a CustomerFacingService in terms of roles that this Service plays. This enables the CustomerFacingService to be managed abstractly using ServiceRoles. It also helps define the Service in terms of the functions that it has or provides. Please see the DEN-ng Service model for more details.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CustomerFacingServiceRole

child.name: customerFacingService
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CFServiceHasCFSRoles

This association end is optional
child.label: customerFacingService

child.name: resourceFacingServiceRole
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..*

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CFSRoleRequiresRFSRoles

This association end is optional
child.label: resourceFacingServiceRole
